attributes.action: breach of UN convetion for a child to have contact with both parents
attributes.additional_details:
The UK and it's family courts continually breach the UN convention of rights of a child on a daily basis by stopping children having contact with both parents.

I want the government who ratified these rights to stick to UK law it agreed to and not allow courts to continually breach UK and UN law by denying parents rights to see their children and denying childrens rights and wishes.
